thread.title: Sweden Bets on Lake-Side Retreat to Attract the Next Generation of Games Developers
thread.title_full: Sweden Bets on Lake-Side Retreat to Attract the Next Generation of Games Developers - WSJ

author: Jens Hansegard
title: Sweden Bets on Lake-Side Retreat to Attract the Next Generation of Games Developers
text:
STOCKHOLM—Starved of new talent, Sweden’s fast-growing videogames industry made an unlikely gamble this summer to attract the next generation of developers: a $200,000 lake-side-cabin retreat.
With the promise of complete isolation deep inside a Swedish forest, former King Digital Entertainment PLC executive Tommy Palm and Rovio Entertainment Ltd.’s general manager Oskar Burman lured 23 young game developers for an eight-week... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
